title: Is the statement 'everything is relative' a true statement? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is a false statement because not everything is relative. But still, it would depend on your concept of “everything” and “relative”. And if everything were relative then even that statement would be itself relative.

The absolute truth in the world is that there is no absolute truth in the world. This means that all truths are relative. In order for one statement to be true, an another statement must be true at the same time.
